snippet: A discarded cigarette butt apparently ignited a fire that caused 4,000 tons of ammunition to detonate Tuesday morning outside Orenburg, in southern Russia.
lead_paragraph: A discarded cigarette butt apparently ignited a fire that caused 4,000 tons of ammunition to detonate Tuesday morning outside Orenburg, in southern Russia.

headline.main: Russia: Private Charged After Cigarette Detonates Explosives
